#summary Developers' Guide - API - Overview
#labels Phase-Implementation,Featured
#sidebar DeveloperAPISidebar

This document is the API specification for Syncless, version 2.0

= Syncless Namespaces =

|| *Namespace* || *Description* ||
|| [DeveloperAPICompareAndSync Syncless.CompareAndSync] || Provides classes for performing comparison and synchronization operations for files and folders. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICompareAndSyncCompareObject Syncless.CompareAndSync.CompareObject] || Provides classes which enclose information needed for comparison of files and folders. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICompareAndSyncEnum Syncless.CompareAndSync.Enum] || Provides enumerations for comparison and synchronization of files and folders. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICompareAndSyncExceptions Syncless.CompareAndSync.Exceptions] || Exception classes which are thrown when there are errors in performing comparison and synchronization operations. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICompareAndSyncManual Syncless.CompareAndSync.Manual] || Provides classes for performing manual synchronization. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICompareAndSyncManualVisitor Syncless.CompareAndSync.Manual.Visitor] || Provides visitor classes needed to perform comparison and synchronization of files and folders. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICompareAndSyncRequest Syncless.CompareAndSync.Request] || Provides classes which enclose information needed for request for comparison and synchronization operations. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICompareAndSyncSeamless Syncless.CompareAndSync.Seamless] || Provides classes for performing seamless synchronization. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICompareAndSyncXMLWriteObject Syncless.CompareAndSync.XMLWriteObject] || Provides classes which enclose information needed for updating XML metadata files during synchronization. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICore Syncless.Core] || Provides classes which perform the main logic of the entire logic layer. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICoreExceptions Syncless.Core.Exceptions] || Exception classes which are thrown when there are errors in the main logic operations. ||
|| [DeveloperAPICoreView Syncless.Core.View] || Provides classes which are abstraction of some classes in the main logic layer which are required by the user interface layer. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIFilter Syncless.Filters] || Provides classes which enclose information needed for filtering of files and folders in synchronization. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIHelper Syncless.Helper] || Provides classes which perform operations common to classes within the Tagging namespace. ||
|| [DeveloperAPILogging Syncless.Logging] || Provides classes which perform logging of events or exceptions to log files. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIMonitor Syncless.Monitor] || Provides classes which perform monitoring of real-time events in file system. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIMonitorDTO Syncless.Monitor.DTO] || Provides classes which enclose information of real-time events in file system. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIMonitorExceptions Syncless.Monitor.Exceptions] || Exception classes which are thrown when there are errors in monitoring real-time events in file system. ||
|| [DeveloperAPINotification Syncless.Notification] || Provides classes which enclose information needed to send notification among classes and between main logic layer and user interface layer. ||
|| [DeveloperAPINotificationUINotification Syncless.Notification.UINotification] || Provides classes which enclose information to send notification for user interface layer. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIProfiling Syncless.Profiling] || Provides classes for drive/computer recognization, conversion of a physical directory/file path to a logical address, and vice versa. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIProfilingExceptions Syncless.Profiling.Exceptions] || Exception classes which are thrown when there are errors in performing drive recognition and profiling operations. ||
|| [DeveloperAPITagging Syncless.Tagging] || Provides classes necessary for creating/removing tags, tagging/untagging folders, managing other settings such as the filter settings per tag. ||
|| [DeveloperAPITaggingExceptions Syncless.Tagging.Exceptions] || Exception classes which are thrown when there are errors in performing tagging-related operations. ||

= SynclessUI Namespaces =

|| *Namespace* || *Description* ||
|| [DeveloperAPIUI SynclessUI] || Provides implementation of various graphical user interface windows. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIUIHelper SynclessUI.Helper] || Provides classes which perform miscellaneous operations. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIUINotification SynclessUI.Notification] || Provides classes which monitor notification events. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIUIProperties SynclessUI.Properties] || Provides properties which enclose the settings of the graphical user interface. ||
|| [DeveloperAPIUIVisitor SynclessUI.Visitor] || Provides visitor classes needed for displaying comparison and synchronization results. ||
